review: I've been using this device for a few months now. I love the user interface,and how easy it is to set up. Not only am I able to stream different apps like Netflix and Hulu Plus. I can also use AllCast to stream movies from my phone to my fire stick. My one negative would be that it often loses connection randomly.

review: Better then expected well worth the money!
author: Stephen Homer "Say something about yourself!"

review: All around great device!  Great being able to hide it behind the TV.  It even comes with an HDMI extender if you can't have it sticking straight out due to wall mounting.  WIFI range is outstanding and includes both 2.4 and 5 ghz.  App available that allows your phone to function as remote and works fantastic.  Amazon even has the stick setup to recognize your account straight out of the box.
author: Public Reviewer # 1

review: I absolutely love this device. It was very easy to hook up and use on my regular HDTV.  I even like the way this functions, better then when I view amazon prime using my smart TV.
